definition: to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Those initially treated operatively, or who died before follow-up were excluded.
sentences.chinese: 除外接受手術治療者和隨訪期內死亡者。
出院後隨訪無疼痛再發。

sentences.english: Conclusion The characteristics of P300 of patients with AD deserve further studies.
sentences.chinese: 結論AD患者P300變化諸特點值得進一步隨訪。

sentences.english: No infection reoccurrence was found at the last time of followup.
sentences.chinese: 在最後隨訪兩組均沒有感染復發的病例。

sentences.english: Tuberous sclerosis is a common life long disease requiring long-term follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 結節性硬化是一種常見的終身性疾病，需要長期隨訪。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the status of tympanic membranes(TMs) and middle ears after tympanostomy tube insertions in children with otitis media with effusion(OME).
sentences.chinese: 目的隨訪分析兒童分泌性中耳炎鼓膜置管後的狀況。

sentences.english: These data show that most cancers are detected as a result of clinical follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 這些數據表明多數癌症是由臨牀隨訪查出來的。

sentences.english: During the follow-up period, no aneurysms and upper digestive track bleeding recurred.
sentences.chinese: 隨訪期間無動脈瘤復發或上消化道出血，腹水消失。

sentences.english: Is getting a waist to take off lifelong sex disease?
sentences.chinese: 結節性硬化是一種常見的終身性疾病，需要長期隨訪。

sentences.english: Six more thrombotic events took place during the year-long follow-up, three each in the two groups.
sentences.chinese: 六血栓事件發生在長達一年的隨訪，各有三個兩組。

sentences.english: Both groups were treated for four weeks and then six month follow-ups.
sentences.chinese: 療程爲四周，治療結束後隨訪6個月。

sentences.english: Results 156 cases were all cured and 2 cases relapse part within 2~12months.
sentences.chinese: 結果156條肢體術後隨訪僅2例有局部復發。

sentences.english: No recurrences were found during 48 months after UAE.
sentences.chinese: 所有病例隨訪48個月，無一例復發。

sentences.english: The mean follow-up was 41 months with no recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 術後平均隨訪41個月，無腫瘤復發。

sentences.english: It is emphasized that the patients should be treated carefully, and followed …
sentences.chinese: 強調治療上需慎重處理，並應定期隨訪觀察病人。

definition: to show an effect/to produce an effect/a conspicuous effect

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4

definition: subject (in an experiment)/participant (in a clinical trial etc)
to get out of trouble/to escape from danger/a danger appears/threatened by danger
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
